movies.title: Mistress America
movies.description: A story that follows a New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment), apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer), and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as their possibility dwindles.

movies.title: Eyes Wide Shut
movies.description: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

movies.title: Lost in Translation
movies.description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.
